import java.util.Scanner; public class GetUserInput { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner myObj = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter FirstName"); // String input String fname = myObj.nextLine(); System.out.println("Enter LastName"); String lname = myObj.nextLine(); // Numerical input System.out.println("Enter Age"); int age = myObj.nextInt(); System.out.println("Enter Payment"); double pay = myObj.nextDouble(); // Output input by user System.out.println("First name: " + fname); System.out.println("Last name: " + lname); System.out.println("Age: " + age); System.out.println("Salary: " + pay); } }
